00031 enum wxbuildinfoformat {
00032     short_f, long_f
00033 };
00034 
00035 wxString wxbuildinfo(wxbuildinfoformat format) {
00036     wxString wxbuild(wxVERSION_STRING);
00037 
00038     if (format == long_f ) {
00039 #if defined(__WXMSW__)
00040         wxbuild << _T("-Windows");
00041 #elif defined(__UNIX__)
00042         wxbuild << _T("-Linux");
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00046         wxbuild << _T("-Unicode build");
00047 #else
00048         wxbuild << _T("-ANSI build");
00049 #endif // wxUSE_UNICODE
00050     }
00051 
00052     return wxbuild;
00053 }

00364 void vtiguiFrame::OnClickLogin(wxCommandEvent& event)
00365 {
00366     Panel1->SetCursor(* wxHOURGLASS_CURSOR);
00367 
00368     wxString myStatus;
00369     myStatus = _("Logando ... ");
00370     StatusBar1->SetStatusText(myStatus);
00371     if (! mySession){
00372         mySession = new wxString(myPerl->login());
00373         myStatus += _("Efetuado! Sessão: ");
00374         StatusBar1->PushStatusText(myStatus);
00375         ToolBar1->EnableTool(login, FALSE);
00376     }
00377     myStatus += * mySession;
00378     StatusBar1->PushStatusText(myStatus);
00379     //wxMessageBox(_("Login efetuado no vtiger!!!"),_("---VTGUI---"));
00380 
00381     loadProjects();
00382     Panel1->SetCursor(* wxSTANDARD_CURSOR);
00383 }

00401 void vtiguiFrame::loadProjects() {
00402     Panel1->SetCursor(* wxHOURGLASS_CURSOR);
00403     if (mySession){
00404         root = TreeCtrlProjects->AddRoot(_("Projects")); //not shown
00405         wxArrayString prj = myPerl->loadProjects( * mySession );
00406         for (int i = 0; i < prj.Count() ; i++){
00407             treeItem[i] = TreeCtrlProjects->AppendItem(root, prj.Item(i), 1);
00408         }
00409         //treeItem[1] = TreeCtrlProjects->AppendItem(root, _("Hounds auto"), 1);
00410         //TreeCtrlProjects->AppendItem(treeItem[0], _("Orçamentos"), 1);
00411     } else {
00412             wxMessageBox(_("Erro ... :P"),_("---VTGUI---"));
00413     }
00414     Panel1->SetCursor(* wxSTANDARD_CURSOR);
00415 }

00417 void vtiguiFrame::loadProjectDetails (wxTreeItemId &id){
00418     wxString theProjectName = TreeCtrlProjects->GetItemText(id);
00419     StatusBar1->SetStatusText(theProjectName);
00420 
00421     projectDetails   =  myPerl->loadProjectDetails(theProjectName);
00422 
00423     // clean tree item to populate
00424     TreeCtrlProjects->DeleteChildren(id);
00425     // iterate over all the project elements
00426     wxProjectStructure::iterator it;
00427     for( it = projectDetails.begin(); it != projectDetails.end(); ++it )
00428     {
00429         wxString key = it->first, value = it->second;
00430         // do something useful with key and value
00431         TreeCtrlProjects->AppendItem(id, key+_(": ")+value);
00432     }
00433 }
00434 void vtiguiFrame::loadProjectEditor(wxTreeItemId &id)
00435 {
00436     wxString theProjectName = TreeCtrlProjects->GetItemText(id);
00437     StatusBar1->SetStatusText(theProjectName);
00438     //load details from tree
00439     wxProjectStructure::iterator it;
00440     for( it = projectDetails.begin(); it != projectDetails.end(); ++it )
00441     {
00442         wxString key = it->first, value = it->second;
00443         //put details in editor
00444 
00445         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("projectname") ))
00446         {
00447             projectName->SetValue(value);
00448         }
00449         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("startdate") ))
00450         {
00451             size_t len = value.length();
00452             char* tmp = new char [ len + 1 ];
00453             strcpy( tmp, value.mb_str() );
00454             time_t rawtime = atoi(tmp);
00455             time ( &rawtime );
00456             wxString myTime = wxString::FromAscii(ctime (&rawtime));
00457 
00458             wxDateTime t = wxDateTime(time_t (rawtime));
00459             startDate-> SetValue(t);
00460         }
00461         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("targetenddate") ))
00462         {
00463 //            targetEndDate->SetValue(value);
00464         }
00465         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("actualenddate") ))
00466         {
00467 //            endDate->SetValue(value);
00468         }
00469         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("projectstatus") ))
00470         {
00471 //            projectStatus->SetValue(value);
00472         }
00473         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("projecttype") ))
00474         {
00475 //            ProjectName->SetValue(value);
00476         }
00477         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("linktoaccountscontacts") ))
00478         {
00479 //            ProjectName->SetValue(value);
00480         }
00481         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("assigned_user_id") ))
00482         {
00483 //            ProjectName->SetValue(value);
00484         }
00485         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("targetbudget") ))
00486         {
00487             projectTargetBudget->SetValue(value);
00488         }
00489         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("projecturl") ))
00490         {
00491             projectUrl->SetValue(value);
00492         }
00493         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("projectpriority") ))
00494         {
00495 //            ProjectName->SetValue(value);
00496         }
00497         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("progress") ))
00498         {
00499 //            ProjectName->SetValue(value);
00500         }
00501         if (key.IsSameAs( _T("description") ))
00502         {
00503             projectDescription->SetValue(value);
00504         }
00505     }
00506 
00507 }
